1.text: Get a package of dehydrated Orbeez.

2.text: Place 1 teaspoon of dehydrated Orbeez in a bowl.

3.text: Pour 3 cups (710 mL) of warm water over the Orbeez.

4.text: Wait 12 hours for the Orbeez to absorb the water and expand.

5.text: Fill an empty 16  fl oz (470 mL) water bottle with your Orbeez.

6.text: Blow up a balloon halfway and twist the neck 2-3 times to keep the air in.

7.text: Stretch the mouth of the balloon over the opening of the water bottle.

8.text: Flip the bottle over to fill the balloon with the Orbeez.

9.text: Slide the mouth of the water bottle out of the balloon.

10.text: Squeeze the excess air out if you’d like and tie the balloon.
